text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

translation.en: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures
translation.id: Sungguh, orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, mereka itulah sebaik-baik makhluk
